languages.text: "В древних свитках мы прочли о чуде, машинном мудреце, что зовется "Когицор"! Он знает ответ на любой вопрос, может управлять иными машинами и даже предсказывать будущее. Многие тяготы вынесли мы с братом, но добыли для столь желанного и дорогого гостя эту волшебную невидаль!"

"The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a mechanical sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"
languages.original_text: "В древних свитках мы прочли о чуде, машинном мудреце, что зовется "Когицор"! Он знает ответ на любой вопрос, может управлять иными машинами и даже предсказывать будущее. Многие тяготы вынесли мы с братом, но добыли для столь желанного и дорогого гостя эту волшебную невидаль!"

traits.locale_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a miracle, a clockwork sage called Cogicor! He is omniscient, can drive other machines and even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but did acquire this magic contraption for our much desired and precious guest!"

"The ancient scrolls tell of a miracle, a clockwork sage called Cogicor! He is omniscient, can drive other machines and even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but did acquire this magic contraption for our much desired and precious guest!"

My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

languages.text: “古老卷宗中记载了一件奇迹造物，那是位名叫‘沉司哲’的机械圣人！它知道一切问题的答案，可以让其他机器服从它的命令，甚至可以预测未来。我和我哥哥历尽千辛万苦，终于为我们无比尊贵的客人弄到了这台神奇的装置！”
languages.original_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a mechanical sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

traits.locale_text: “古老卷宗中记载了一件奇迹造物，那是位名叫‘沉司哲’的机械圣人！它知道一切问题的答案，可以让其他机器服从它的命令，甚至可以预测未来。我和我哥哥历尽千辛万苦，终于为我们无比尊贵的客人弄到了这台神奇的装置！”
“古老卷宗中记载了一件奇迹造物，那是位名叫‘沉司哲’的发条圣人！它知道一切问题的答案，可以让其他机器服从它的命令，甚至可以预测未来。我和我哥哥历尽千辛万苦，终于为我们无比尊贵的客人弄到了这台神奇的装置！”

languages.text: 「古の巻物には、コギコルという名の機械仕掛けの賢者についての驚異が記されています！あらゆる問いに答え、他の機械を従わせ、さらには未来をも予言するかもしれない存在です。兄弟と私は数々の苦難を乗り越え、この魔法の装置を敬愛する客人のために手に入れたのです！」
languages.original_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a clockwork sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

traits.locale_text: 「古の巻物には、コギコルという名の機械仕掛けの賢者についての驚異が記されています！あらゆる問いに答え、他の機械を従わせ、さらには未来をも予言するかもしれない存在です。兄弟と私は数々の苦難を乗り越え、この魔法の装置を敬愛する客人のために手に入れたのです！」

languages.text: «¡Los antiguos pergaminos hablan de una maravilla, un sabio mecánico que llaman cogicor! Conoce las respuestas a todas las preguntas, puede someter a otras máquinas a su voluntad, incluso es capaz de adivinar el porvenir. ¡Mi hermano y yo hemos vivido un sinfín de penurias, mas al fin hemos podido obtener este artefacto mágico para {mf|nuestro estimado invitado|nuestra estimada invitada}!».
languages.original_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a mechanical sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Los antiguos pergaminos hablan de una maravilla, un sabio mecánico que llaman cogicor! «¡Los antiguos pergaminos hablan de una maravilla, un sabio mecánico que llaman cogicor! Conoce las respuestas a todas las preguntas, puede someter a otras máquinas a su voluntad, incluso es capaz de adivinar el porvenir. ¡Mi hermano y yo hemos vivido un sinfín de penurias, mas al fin hemos podido obtener este artefacto mágico para {mf|nuestro estimado invitado|nuestra estimada invitada}!».

languages.text: "Kadim tomarlar, Kavrasar adındaki mekanik bir bilgeden söz eder! Tüm soruların cevabını bilen, diğer makinelere istediğini yaptırabilen, hatta geleceği bile tahmin edebilen bir keramet! Kardeşimle birçok zorluğa göğüs germiştik, kıymetli misafirimiz için bu sihirli düzeneği ele geçirmeyi başardık!"
languages.original_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a mechanical sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

Kardeşimle birçok zorluğa göğüs germiştik, kıymetli misafirimiz için bu sihirli düzeneği ele geçirmeyi başardık!"

languages.text: « Les anciens parchemins parlent d'une merveille, d'un sage mécanique connu sous le nom de "Cogicor", qui détient la réponse à toutes les questions, peut forcer les autres machines à lui obéir et est même capable de prédire l'avenir. Mon frère et moi avons surmonté bien des épreuves dans le but de nous procurer cet appareil magique pour notre noble hôte ! »
languages.original_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a mechanical sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

traits.locale_text: « Les anciens parchemins parlent d'une merveille, d'un sage mécanique connu sous le nom de "Cogicor", qui détient la réponse à toutes les questions, peut forcer les autres machines à lui obéir et est même capable de prédire l'avenir. Mon frère et moi avons surmonté bien des épreuves dans le but de nous procurer cet appareil magique pour notre noble hôte ! »

« Les anciens parchemins parlent d'une merveille, d'un sage mécanique connu sous le nom de "Cogicor", qui détient la réponse à toutes les questions, peut forcer les autres machines à lui obéir et même est même capable de prédire l'avenir. Mon frère et moi avons surmonté bien des épreuves dans le but de nous procurer cet appareil magique pour notre noble hôte ! »

languages.text: "Die alten Schriftrollen sprechen von einem Wunder, einem mechanischn Weisen namens Cogicor! Er kennt die Antworten auf alle Fragen, kann andere Maschinen seinem Willen unterwerfen und sogar die Zukunft prophezeien. Mein Bruder und ich haben viel durchlitten, konnten aber diese magische Apparatur für unseren hochgeschätzten Gast erwerben!"
languages.original_text: "The ancient scrolls tell of a wonder, a mechanical sage by the name of Cogicor! It knows the answers to all questions, can make other machines do its bidding, and may even predict the future. My brother and I have borne many a hardship, but we managed to acquire this magic contraption for our much-cherished guest!"

"Die alten Schriftrollen sprechen von einem Wunder, einem Aufziehweisen namens Cogicor! Er kennt die Antworten auf alle Fragen, kann andere Maschinen seinem Willen unterwerfen und sogar die Zukunft prophezeien. Mein Bruder und ich haben viel durchlitten, konnten aber diese magische Apparatur für unseren hochgeschätzten Gast erwerben!"
